results.title: Western Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Holiday”.
Experience the highlights of Western Australia beginning with the wildlife and good food at Margaret River, visit the Pinnacles, enjoy a range of sporting activities at Merribrook, join a cattle muster at El Questro or a novelty gypsy caravan tour, explore the Spanish architecture at New Norcia - the country town built to bring christianity to the Aborigines, visit the Pilbara and picturesque Broome or board a yacht to explore remote sections of Western Australia’s spectacular coastline.

results.title: The Black pirate. - [Edited version]
results.creator_credit: Saul J. Turell, Paul Killiam and Gregstan Enterprises
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “History of the Motion Picture”.
An edited and narrated presentation of the duels, sea battles and acrobatics in the ‘Black Pirate’ an adventure film made in 1926 starring Douglas Fairbanks. Includes the famous sliding-down-the-sail stunt. Also stars Billie Dove.

results.title: New South Wales
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Holiday”.
Enjoy the tranquil beauty of Myall Lakes, experience a journey on the Zig Zag railway aboard a steam locomotion, tour Fort Denison or take an alpine escape to the Snowy Mountains, view the spectacular rugged coastline at Murramarang, cruise Sydney Harbour on a replica of the ‘Bounty’, stargaze in the Warrumbungles, visit the Blue Mountains, sample the local product at the Pepper Tree vineyard in the Hunter Valley - the cradle of Australian wine making and complete your New South Wales tour with a 9 day marathon bike road tour.

results.title: The Thief of Baghdad. - [Edited version]
results.creator_credit: Saul J. Turell, Paul Killiam and Gregstan Enterprises
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “History of the Motion Picture”.
An edited version with commentary of the children’s silent classic adventure fantasy, “The Thief of Baghdad” made in 1924 and directed by Raoul Walsh. Features Douglas Fairbanks in the role of the thief.

results.title: Tasmania
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Holiday”.
Tasmania’s attractions highlighted in this video range from the picturesque landscapes of Cataract Gorge, Cradle Mountain and Flinders Island to relaxing sporting events such as fishing at London Lakes and viewing the Targa Road Race. Visit historical Port Arthur, Hawley House and the grave of Tom Roberts and indulge in a novelty stop-over at a reproduction Swiss Village.

results.title: Nosferatu (Dracula). - [Edited version]
results.creator_credit: Saul J. Turell, Paul Killiam and Sterling Educational Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “History of the Motion Picture”.
A horror tale about a vampire who stalks his victims in the deepening shadows of the night. An edited version of the 1922 German silent motion picture, Nosferatu (Dracula), directed by F. W. Murnau, with commentary. Cast features Max Schreck as Dracula.

results.title: Holiday
results.brief_description: From ABC Television’s award-winning and popularly acclaimed travel program ‘Holiday’ comes a series of eight fabulous videos covering every facet of holidaying in the states and territories of Australia. Whether you’re looking for a luxury five star resort or the chance to get off the beaten track, this series has got Australia covered.
results.description: From ABC Television’s award-winning and popularly acclaimed travel program ‘Holiday’ comes a series of eight fabulous videos covering every facet of holidaying in the states and territories of Australia. Whether you’re looking for a luxury five star resort or the chance to get off the beaten track, this series has got Australia covered.

Whether you’re looking for a luxury five star resort or the chance to get off the beaten track, this series has got Australia covered.

results.title: South Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Holiday”.
Visit the rich, fertile Barossa Valley, trek into the outback, enjoy the spectacular view from Mt Lofty House in the Adelaide Hills beautifully restored after the 1983 Ash Wednesday bush fires, visit the Gawler Ranges and the seaside town of Victor Harbour, charter a yacht at Port Lincoln, explore the heritage buildings in the mining town of Burra, journey by train from Adelaide to Alice Springs on the legendary Ghan, stay in an underground hotel in the opal mining town of Coober Pedy and finally enjoy a boat trip at Coorong.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Holiday”.

results.title: The General. - [Edited version]
results.creator_credit: Saul J. Turell, Paul Killiam and Film Classics
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “History of the Motion Picture”.
An edited version of Clyde Bruckman and Buster Keaton’s 1926 comedy feature, showing Buster Keaton in his most successful period as an actor and director of this satire on Civil War espionage. Combines good examples of Keaton’s dry wit and acute sense of timing. This edited work, narrated by Paul Killiam, indicates the significance of ‘The General’ in film history.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Saul J. Turell, Paul Killiam and Film Classics

results.title: Yankee clipper. - [Edited version]
results.creator_credit: Cecil B. DeMille, Saul J. Turell, Paul Killiam and Sterling Educational Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “History of the Motion Picture”.
William Boyd, a popular star even in those days before his portrayal of Hopalong Cassidy, is seen in a condensed version of the 1927 adventure romance film produced by Cecil B. De Mille. Boyd stars as the captain of an American clipper that outruns the British to win the China tea trade.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Cecil B. DeMille, Saul J. Turell, Paul Killiam and Sterling Educational Films

Episode of Series “History of the Motion Picture”.
William Boyd, a popular star even in those days before his portrayal of Hopalong Cassidy, is seen in a condensed version of the 1927 adventure romance film produced by Cecil B. De Mille. Boyd stars as the captain of an American clipper that outruns the British to win the China tea trade.
